In England, in the seven days to 19 August, there were 184,676 new confirmed cases (326.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 August, there were 173,074 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (11,602 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 August is 5,707,906 (10,093.5 cases per 100,000 population).
